Brilliant, check out his No2 as well @simonhendi @fuckbingha https://t.co/NMmnFOiIaf
@JustBarry39 @fuckbingha pure shite that thing was. Although I was probably watching Big Break at the time so can't really judge
@fuckbingha @JustBarry39 Small mercies this time, not many people on Facebook pretending to like 'Allo 'Allo just to get the RIP in
@fuckbingha @JustBarry39 he always catches someone out with it. He even reeled a few in over Leonard Cohen
@fluf_ Greatest of all ancient Irish ballads: The Glugging of Flatley
@fluf_ Although that addictive glitchy glug effect could easily be Flatley having his head shoved down a drain
Brilliant, elegant techno, sound designed to the nth degree https://t.co/PLSyhFR6KM
@JustBarry39 @fuckbingha That's me when Roddy Doyle opens Facebook
@fuckbingha Gonna get stuck into the Edgar's solo albums, even if they're kinda preposterous. Not as daft as Holgar's though
